turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm looking to book a table for dinner tonight. Somewhere nice, preferably Italian.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! Could you please tell me what area you're interested in and how many people will be in your party?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: We're looking in downtown. And there will be 4 of us. Around 7:30 PM?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, let me see. There's 'Bella Notte' which has excellent reviews and availability at 7:30 PM for four. Or 'Luigi's' is another option, slightly more casual. Do either of those sound appealing?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Bella Notte sounds good! What's their cancellation policy? Just in case, you know...

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Bella Notte allows cancellations up to 2 hours before the reservation time without penalty. After that, there may be a small charge of $25 per person. I will make the reservation for you.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Perfect, thanks! One last thing, does Bella Notte have any options for gluten-free pasta? My wife has celiac disease, so it's important.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, Bella Notte does offer gluten-free pasta options. I would still recommend mentioning it to your server when you arrive. Your reservation for 4 at Bella Notte at 7:30 PM is confirmed. You will receive a confirmation email shortly. Is there anything else I can help you with?
